item.title: How to add staff login announcement [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:7, topic:424488”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=527144.msg3841897#msg3841897 date=1323303779]

	public void onlineMessage() {
		for (final Player player : PlayerHandler.players) {
			final Client o = (Client) player;
			if (o != null) {
				if (c.playerRights == 1) {
					o.sendMessage("Moderator " + c.playerName + " is now online.");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 2) {
					o.sendMessage("Admin " + c.playerName + " is now online.");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 3) {
					o.sendMessage("Owner " + c.playerName + " is now online.");
				}
			}
		}
	}

Under initialize in the Client class

getPA().onlineMessage();

The first part goes in playerassistant.java right? OR client.java people always mix it up, i tried both :3
[/quote]client.java[/quote]

thanks

Read full topic

Under initialize in the Client class

getPA().onlineMessage();[/quote]
The first part goes in playerassistant.java right? OR client.java people always mix it up, i tried both :3

			final Client o = (Client) player;
			if (o != null) {
				if (c.playerRights == 1) {

item.title: How to add staff login announcement [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:3, topic:424488”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=527144.msg3841778#msg3841778 date=1323299530]
Well lets start with the basics, are you calling that method anywhere?
[/quote]
ofcourse :3 I’m not a complete idiot like half the nubby nubs who join :D[/quote]
Seems like you are heres what i use.

Make sure you add this somewhere

loginMessage();

public void loginMessage() { for (final Player player : PlayerHandler.players) { if (player != null) { final Client c2 = (Client) player; if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Andrew") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Pot up pls")) { c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Owner] " + Misc.optimizeText(playerName) + " has logged in!</col>"); } else if (playerRights == 3) { c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Co-Owner] " + Misc.optimizeText(playerName) + " has logged in! Feel free to ask him for help!</col>"); } if (playerRights == 2) { c2.sendMessage("<shad=1166775>[Administrator] " + Misc.optimizeText(playerName) + " has logged in! Feel free to ask him for help!</col>"); } if (playerRights == 1) { c2.sendMessage("<shad=747483648>[Moderator] " + Misc.optimizeText(playerName) + " has logged in! Feel free to ask him for help!</col>"); } if (playerRights == 69 && isDonator == 69) { c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Donator] " + Misc.optimizeText(playerName) + " has logged in!</col>"); } } } }

Read full topic

item.title: How to add staff login announcement [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

Anyways. In my playerassistant.java i’ve come up with this.

public void onlineMessage() { for(Player player : PlayerHandler.players) { Client All = (Client)player; if(All != null && c != null) { if(c.playerRights == 1) All.sendMessage("Moderator "+c.playerName+" is now online."); else if(c.playerRights == 2) All.sendMessage("Admin "+c.playerName+" is now online."); else if(c.playerRights == 3) All.sendMessage("Owner "+c.playerName+" is now online."); } else System.out.println("Method tried to reach a nulled object."); } }
And when staff logins in nothing happens still :3
So help plox

Read full topic
